Eric Schmidt , who has headed up Google since July 2001, sent a message via Twitter Thursday saying: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on new products and projects. Google on Thursday also announced fourth quarter net income of$ 2.54 billion, or$ 7.81 a share, up from$ 1.97 billion,

has product sense and an appetite for making new things, as opposed to talent for selling things,'' said Michael Hawley , a longtime M.I.T. professor who knows Mr. Page socially and has advised him on writing projects. Larry is more the archetype of founder, innovator, hacker, inventor, interested in all of the magical things that digital technologies do. But others say that Mr. Eric Schmidt 's two biggest job responsibilities- being the public face of the company and managing internal politics- are areas where Mr. Page has less experience.
